room_title: Escape room "The Zany Zoo" by Lock & Clue Escape Rooms in Providence
review: Took our girl scout troop - they had a blast in the zoo. And it was amazing to watch them work together. Zoo keeper Zack was great with the girls also. Thanks all!!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Zany Zoo" by Lock & Clue Escape Rooms in Providence
review: Our 2nd grade Brownie troop opted for an escape room party, so we booked the Zany Zoo. They loved it! It was perfect for a group this age, and the Zoo Keeper did a fantastic job leading them to clues when needed, but let them do as much as they could on their own. Would highly recommend for a birthday party, or even just a fun afternoon activity!
